Package net.TheDgtl.Stargate.network.portal

Class RandomPortal

java.lang.Object
net.TheDgtl.Stargate.network.portal.AbstractPortal
net.TheDgtl.Stargate.network.portal.RandomPortal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Portal, RealPortal
public class RandomPortal extends AbstractPortal
A portal that always chooses a random destination within its own network

  • Constructor Details

    • RandomPortal

      public RandomPortal(Network network, String name, org.bukkit.block.Block signBlock, Set<PortalFlag> flags, UUID ownerUUID) throws NameErrorException, NoFormatFoundException, GateConflictException
      Instantiates a new random portal
      Parameters:
      network -

      The network the portal belongs to

      name -

      The name of the portal

      signBlock -

      The block this portal's sign is located at

      flags -

      The flags enabled for the portal

      ownerUUID -

      The UUID of the portal's owner

      Throws:
      NameErrorException -

      If the portal name is invalid

      NoFormatFoundException -

      If no gate format matches the portal

      GateConflictException -

      If the portal's gate conflicts with an existing one

      public void drawControlMechanisms()
      Description copied from interface: RealPortal
      Draws any control mechanisms belonging to this portal

      This basically just re-draws the portal's sign or whichever other mechanisms the portal may use.
